channel.title: QTime

item.title: Version 1.0.8+9
item.description:
Technical Highlights

Performance Improvements

  • Implemented request caching system for faster data retrieval
  • Optimized daily activity tracking and storage
  • Enhanced data synchronization between local and server storage

User Experience Enhancements

  • Video-like screenshot playback with timeline controls
  • Improved dashboard with online/offline status indicators
  • Enhanced contacts management with sorting and filtering
  • Streamlined main menu interface

System Reliability

  • Fixed critical updater issues preventing proper version management
  • Resolved domain detection problems in browser tracking
  • Improved function binding for manager applications

Technical Highlights

Performance Improvements

  • Implemented request caching system for faster data retrieval
  • Optimized daily activity tracking and storage

User Experience Enhancements

  • Enhanced contacts management with sorting and filtering
  • Streamlined main menu interface

System Reliability

  • Resolved domain detection problems in browser tracking
  • Improved function binding for manager applications
Mon, 14 Jul 2025 15:38:00
